page.title: 2017th.c.FAIRE,BRILL,JUNE,1985
page.content: Last week we were celebrating the 300th anniversary of the windmill on the common.It lasted for 2 days.Most people from Brill were dressed in 17th.c. clothes.The faire opened at 10am.but most people arrived at the common early afternoon.There were lots of stalls such as a biscuit stall which raised money for Brill school.There were lots of shows such as recorder and maypole concerts and dancing.Lots of people bought clay medallions with windmills on the front.There were also games including the slippery pole.The dances started at eight but the pig was eaten at ten.Then the final moment came.The windmill was lit up and the fireworks were set off.Everyone sang Happy Birthday to the windmill. This report was made by class 4 children at Brill School,June,1985.
